root.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
root.description: OverviewHarry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 is based upon the upcoming theatrical film of the same name. It is the final game in the Electronic Arts-produced series based upon the movies.GameplayThe Third Person Shooter gameplay which was introduced in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 will again be the main gameplay style. This of course means that there also is a cover system. You will be duelling against Death Eaters, Giants and Snatchers. And Voldemort. Probably. Bellatrix will be there too.Playable CharactersUnlike Part 1, which allowed the player to only control Harry, the player's perspective will shift between multiple characters in this final installment. Characters that the player will control include:Harry PotterHermione GrangerRon WeasleyGinny WeasleySeamus FinniganNeville LongbottomMolly WeasleyMinerva McGonagallEach time you play as a new character you will be introduced to a new spell.LocationsLocations visited in the film will also be seen in the game. Among those locations are:Hogwarts CastleHogsmeade VillageGringotts Wizarding BankSystem RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7Processor: Single Core 2.4GHz or Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalentMemory: 1.5GB RAMVideo card: 256MB DX9c compatible graphics card. Geforce 6800, Ati X1600 or better. Laptop chipsets may work but are not supported.Soundcard: DirectX 9.0c or higher compliant sound cardDirectX: DirectX 9.0c
